name: Yoink Saru
description:
Controls:
Keyboard or Mouse or Controller
Keyboard: ASWD or Arrows = left/right movement, up = jump
Keyboard: L-Shift, L-Cntrl, L-Alt = Slide/Melee/Throw attacks
Keyboard: Spacebar = Jump/Multi-jump/Glide(held)
Keyboard: Escape = Pause Game/Menu

Mouse: L-Click, R-Click, M-Click = Melee/Throw/Slide attacks

Controller: Left-Stick = left/right movement
Controller: X, Y, B buttons = Slide/Melee/Throw attacks
Controller: A = Jump/Multi-jump/Glide(held)
Controller: Start = Pause Game/Menu
